Should have: A process for compressing Mailbags and managing compressed Mailbags
A process for external tools to use email source data, like RATOM or ePADD to use MBOX data within a Mailbag
Provide Beyond the Repository (BTR) compliant BagIt Profiles
Provide feedback to users about what the tool is doing and its pace of progress
Optionally generate WARC files that include embedded CSS and Images
Optionally capture external links within WARC files
Easy process for exporting or connecting with a tool to replay WARC files
Report the email folders included in a Mailbag and the number of included email in each folder and the account overall
Modular/extendable dependencies that work out-of-the box, but can be overridden
Dependancies configurable via YAML or simmilar
Process for upgrading and managing dependencies
Provide an executable for multiple platforms
Clear documentation for managing system privileges
